name: Codifferous
tag_list: coding, software, web-development, programming, code-review, development
overview:
Codifferous is a code review web application.

Codifferous is designed for use both by individuals and teams, and features simple code importing from GitHub or BitBucket repositories. Once code has been imported, users can begin marking lines as accepted or rejected, comment on lines, invite other team members and track team members’ progress.

Codifferous can also be used to review code in third party libraries, tools and repositories. We also support code branch reviews, and automatically mark lines as unreviewed when the code base changes.
